title.name: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory Maximizing Student Potential (MSP) Research Fellowship

awards.description: Maximizing Student Potential research fellowship on the Surface Water and Ocean Topography (SWOT) & Sentinel-6 Michael Freilich (Sentinel-6A) operations team working on tools and analysis to support the mission.
Secured $1,500 in funding from NASA to support research initiative following a formulated research proposal. Second Place in Technical Paper Award.
